import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCheckCircle } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import {useNavigation} from "react-navi"; const Success: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const navigation = useNavigation() const deleteAll = (): any => { localStorage.removeItem('items') const itemsArray: any = [] localStorage.setItem('items', JSON.stringify(itemsArray)) window.location.reload() } const onClick = (): any => { navigation.navigate('/checkout').then(() => { console.log('ok') }) } return (
Successful purchase!

Your order has been placed and we will contact you shortly. Thank you for choosing us. We look forward to seeing you again next time!

Back
) } export default Success
